recommendations.name: DENIS KALENGA WATSHIPAMBA
recommendations.recommend: I had the pleasure of working with Toussaint for two years, collaborating on several projects. He has proved to be a very organized and passionate engineer. Highly recommendable.

recommendations.name: Happen Mathebula
recommendations.recommend: Toussaint Saraza, is the most persistent person I have seen in Microverse, he progressed any many aspects in short period, along side with his technical skills his soft skills are great too.

recommendations.name: Ibrahim Ahmat
recommendations.recommend: Toussaint Saraza, is the most persistent person I have seen in Microverse, he progressed any many aspects in short period, along side with his technical skills his soft skills are great too.

projects.name: Luxy Rides
projects.description: This project is made for the reservation of fancy cars. If you're preparing for a special day/event and you want a cool car for it this website is the best place for you.
